channel.title: Consulting on Pozibl - the art of the possible
channel.description: Recent content in Consulting on Pozibl - the art of the possible

item.title: Architecture Labs
item.description:
Not sure about the impact of alternative technology choices on total cost to build? Pozible can assist through modelling various options and assessing their relative costs and benefits.

Example studies include:

  • Last mile technology choice (eg: fibre vs wireless)
  • Network capacity and coverage strategic forward planning
  • Next generation PON deployment strategies
  • MDU capacity strategies
  • etcâ€¦
